title: New client
body: I play league on my laptop, it is not good, it can run s6 client well, but has a lot of issues on the new client. when I select champions, it always need 3 seconds to react, and I can't change my mastery frequently. Now when I am writing this, I am in a 5 minutes punishment for not select champions, because it crashed when I click on lock in. I really want to go back to the old client, it was epic and nice, and probably most people like the old one, too

replies.body:
You can freely switch between the New and Legacy client at the login screen, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

However, if you'd rather troubleshoot the issues you're experiencing with the new client, I wanted to mention that the issues are likely caused by a poor connection to the servers. You should be able to resolve this by working through the steps listed inside our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
